TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit FORMATETC extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 通用的剪貼簿格式，包含目標裝置、資料的外觀或檢視，以及儲存媒體指示器 (Indicator)。

span.span: A generalized Clipboard format containing a target device, the aspect or view of the data, and a storage medium indicator.

remarks.format: ## Remarks FORMATETC 結構做為 OLE 函式和需要的資料格式資訊的方法中的參數。The FORMATETC structure is used as a parameter in OLE functions and methods requiring data format information. 如需有關使用程式設計結構和 Microsoft Management Console (MMC)，請參閱 < [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview)。For more information about programming with the structure and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).
